description.english: Any hero easy difficulty clearance
description.schinese: 任意英雄简单难度通关
description.tchinese: 任意英雄簡單難度通關

description.english: Any hero normal mode clearance
description.schinese: 任意英雄普通模式通关
description.tchinese: 任意英雄普通模式通關

description.english: Any hero ha ha mode clearance
description.schinese: 任意英雄呵呵模式通关
description.tchinese: 任意英雄呵呵模式通關

description.english: All heroes easy difficulty clearance
description.schinese: 全英雄简单难度通关
description.tchinese: 全英雄簡單難度通關

description.english: All heroes normal mode clearance
description.schinese: 全英雄普通模式通关
description.tchinese: 全英雄普通模式通關

description.english: All heroes ha ha mode clearance
description.schinese: 全英雄呵呵模式通关
description.tchinese: 全英雄呵呵模式通關

description.english: Buy out the store at one time
description.schinese: 一次性买空商店物品
description.tchinese: 一次性買空商店物品

description.english: 5, 000 gold COINS from one sale
description.schinese: 一次贩卖所得5000金币
description.tchinese: 一次販賣所得5000金幣

description.english: The deposit is 30,000 gold pieces
description.schinese: 存款达到3万金币
description.tchinese: 存款達到3萬金幣

description.english: Any skill reaches full level
description.schinese: 任意技能达到满级
description.tchinese: 任意技能達到滿級

description.english: Both skills reach full level at the same time
description.schinese: 双技能同时达到满级
description.tchinese: 雙技能同時達到滿級

description.english: A unit reaches full rank
description.schinese: 一个兵种达到满级
description.tchinese: 一個兵種達到滿級

description.english: All four reach full rank at the same time
description.schinese: 四个在阵兵种同时满级
description.tchinese: 四個在陣兵種同時滿級

description.english: Graveyard level 3
description.schinese: 墓地等级达到3级
description.tchinese: 墓地等級達到3級

description.english: Use the grand knight
description.schinese: 使用大骑士通关
description.tchinese: 使用大騎士通關

description.english: Use wizard shooter to clear customs
description.schinese: 使用精灵射手通关
description.tchinese: 使用精靈射手通關

description.english: Use the lich to clear customs
description.schinese: 使用巫妖通关
description.tchinese: 使用巫妖通關

description.english: Use holy ranger
description.schinese: 使用神圣游侠通关
description.tchinese: 使用神聖遊俠通關

description.english: Use venomous lizards
description.schinese: 使用剧毒蜥蜴通关
description.tchinese: 使用劇毒蜥蜴通關

description.english: Go through with skeleton generals
description.schinese: 使用骷髅将军通关
description.tchinese: 使用骷髏將軍通關

description.english: Use the phalanx leader to clear customs
description.schinese: 使用方阵队长通关
description.tchinese: 使用方陣隊長通關

description.english: Do not have a simple difficult heritage clearance
description.schinese: 不用遗物通关简单难度
description.tchinese: 不用遺物通關簡單難度

description.english: Do not enter the training ground to pass the normal difficulty
description.schinese: 不用进训练场通关普通难度
description.tchinese: 不用進訓練場通關普通難度

description.english: Do not open the backpack to complete the ha ha difficulty
description.schinese: 不打开背包通关呵呵难度
description.tchinese: 不打開背包通關呵呵難度

description.english: Survive 1 turn in battle at 1 HP
description.schinese: 在战斗中以1点血幸存1回合
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中以1點血倖存1回合

description.english: Beat any Boss without damage
description.schinese: 无伤打赢任意Boss
description.tchinese: 無傷打贏任意Boss

description.english: Gold COINS greater than 30,000 when customs clearance
description.schinese: 通关时金币大于3万
description.tchinese: 通關時金幣大於3萬

description.english: Use 3 wanted posters at a time
description.schinese: 一次战斗使用3张通缉令
description.tchinese: 一次戰鬥使用3張通緝令

description.english: Win a boss battle without elimination
description.schinese: 不进行消除就打赢一个boss战
description.tchinese: 不進行消除就打贏一個boss戰

description.english: Hero health up to 10,000
description.schinese: 英雄血量达到1万
description.tchinese: 英雄血量達到1萬

description.english: The knapsack was completely full
description.schinese: 背包完全塞满
description.tchinese: 背包完全塞滿

description.english: Beat the boss with 20+ dot
description.schinese: 带着20+个dot击败boss
description.tchinese: 帶著20+個dot擊敗boss

description.english: More than 20, 000 heal per battle
description.schinese: 一场战斗累积回血超过2万
description.tchinese: 一場戰鬥累積回血超過2萬

description.english: Purge over 50 units per battle
description.schinese: 一场战斗累积驱散超过50个单位
description.tchinese: 一場戰鬥累積驅散超過50個單位

description.english: Stack poison over 256 layers
description.schinese: 叠毒超过256层
description.tchinese: 疊毒超過256層

description.english: There are 20 burning enemies
description.schinese: 全场有20个燃烧的棋子
description.tchinese: 全場有20個燃燒的敵人

description.english: There are dazed units on both sides
description.schinese: 敌我都有晕眩的单位
description.tchinese: 敵我都有暈眩的單位

description.english: Reach the lamp god hiding option
description.schinese: 达成灯神的隐藏选项
description.tchinese: 達成燈神的隱藏選項

description.english: The casino won three in a row
description.schinese: 赌场连赢3次
description.tchinese: 賭場連贏3次

description.english: Use 2 different heroes to finish the puzzle
description.schinese: 用2个不同英雄连续通关呵呵难度
description.tchinese: 用2個不同英雄連續通關呵呵難度

description.english: All our pieces have debuff
description.schinese: 我方所有棋子都有debuff
description.tchinese: 我方所有棋子都有debuff

description.english: Three five's in a round
description.schinese: 一回合达成3次五消
description.tchinese: 一回合達成3次五消

description.english: Hehe difficulty boss battle confrontation over 30 rounds  undead
description.schinese: 呵呵难度boss战对峙超过30个回合不死
description.tchinese: 呵呵難度boss戰對峙超過30個回合不死

description.english: Kill 50 enemies in one battle
description.schinese: 在一场战斗中累积击杀50个敌人
description.tchinese: 在一場戰鬥中累積擊殺50個敵人

description.english: Attack 500 pieces in a single battle
description.schinese: 在一场战斗中，累积出击500个棋子
description.tchinese: 在一場戰鬥中，累積出擊500個棋子

description.english: Gather together the <three pieces of doom>
description.schinese: 集齐「厄运三件套」
description.tchinese: 集齊「厄運三件套」

description.english: Seven felonies.
description.schinese: 集齐「七重罪」
description.tchinese: 集齊「七重罪」

description.english: A single enemy's turn counts >10
description.schinese: 单个敌人的行动回合数>10
description.tchinese: 單個敵人的行動回合數>10

description.english: KEY_ACH_CHALLENGE_BOMBERKILLENEMY_DESC
description.schinese: 释放棋盘中的炸弹人击杀棋子
description.tchinese: 釋放棋盤中的炸彈人擊殺敵人

description.schinese: 使用过全部的道具

description.tchinese: 將所有兵種升到過滿級

description.schinese: 累积击杀100只火焰巨龙

description.schinese: 累积造成2万点剧毒伤害
description.tchinese: 累積造成2萬點劇毒傷害

description.schinese: 累积造成2万点火焰伤害
description.tchinese: 累積造成2萬點火焰傷害

description.schinese: 虚无之地-呵呵难度通关
description.tchinese: 虛無之地-呵呵難度通關

description.english: Die in a battle after eat 6 or  more recover items. （Special thanks to player
description.schinese: 在一场战斗中食用6个食物后仍然死亡。（由众筹玩家 力量777  提供创意）
description.tchinese: 在壹場戰鬥中食用6個食物後仍然死亡。（由眾籌玩家 力量777  提供創意）

description.english: Hit combo over 666.（Special  thanks to player
description.schinese: 连击到达666及以上。（由众筹玩家  宝宝是元宵 提供创意）
description.tchinese: 連擊到達666及以上。（由眾籌玩家 寶寶是元宵 提供創意）

description.english: Die in a battle with 80,000  coins or more.（Special thanks to player
description.schinese: 死亡时身上有8w金币。（由众筹玩家  海葵派大师兄 提供创意）
description.tchinese: 死亡時身上有8w金幣。（由眾籌玩家 海葵派大師兄  提供創意）

displayName.english: Are you crazy or am I

description.english: Match 5 turns in-a-row without  hurt any enemy.（Special thanks to player
description.schinese: 玩家连续5个回合消除非医疗单位之后没有击中任何目标。（由众筹玩家  八云蓝的尾巴 提供创意）
description.tchinese: 玩家連續5個回合消除非醫療單位之後沒有擊中任何目標。（由眾籌玩家  八雲藍的尾巴 提供創意）

description.english: Complete 1 cycle in Infinity Mode with any hero.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中，任一英雄完成1周目挑战
description.tchinese: 壹局遊戲中，任壹英雄完成1周目挑戰

description.english: Complete 5 cycles in Infinity Mode with any hero.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中，任一英雄完成5周目挑战
description.tchinese: 壹局遊戲中，任壹英雄完成5周目挑戰

description.english: Complete 10 cycles in Infinity Mode with any hero.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中，任一英雄完成10周目挑战
description.tchinese: 壹局遊戲中，任壹英雄完成10周目挑戰

description.english: All heroes complete 1 cycle in Infinity Mode
description.schinese: 所有种族英雄都完成1周目挑战
description.tchinese: 所有種族英雄都完成1周目挑戰

description.english: All heroes complete 5 cycles in Infinity Mode
description.schinese: 所有种族英雄都完成5周目挑战
description.tchinese: 所有種族英雄都完成5周目挑戰

description.english: All heroes complete 10 cycles in Infinity Mode
description.schinese: 所有种族英雄都完成10周目挑战
description.tchinese: 所有種族英雄都完成10周目挑戰

description.english: Human level increased to 10
description.schinese: 人族等级提升至10级
description.tchinese: 人族等級提升至10級

description.schinese: 精灵族等级提升至10级
description.tchinese: 精靈族等級提升至10級
